setup.openrouterHint: Get your API key from openrouter.ai

setup.accessPasswordHint: You'll need this password to log in.

sidebar.confirmDeletePermanent: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this conversation? This cannot be undone.

scheduledJobs.title: Scheduled Jobs
scheduledJobs.askAssistant: Ask the assistant to create recurring tasks.

schedulerDetail.title: Scheduler Details
schedulerDetail.cronHint: Format: minute hour day month weekday (e.g., 0 9 * * * for daily at 9am)
schedulerDetail.noRunsYet: No runs yet. The scheduler will create conversations when it runs.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.configureOAuth: Configure OAuth providers in your environment.

apps.title: Apps
apps.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.openrouterHelp: Choose models for your AI agent. Powered by OpenRouter.
settings.helpDesc: Chat with us if you need help
settings.customInstructionsDesc: These instructions will be added to every conversation. Use them to customize the agent's behavior.
settings.customInstructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Always respond in Polish. Use formal tone. Focus on concise answers.
settings.zenoApiKeysDesc: Generate API keys to access ZENO from external tools and scripts.
settings.zenoApiKeyCopyHint: Copy this key now. It won't be shown again.

customSkills.title: Custom Skills
customSkills.noSkillsHint: Create skills to teach the agent new capabilities.
customSkills.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Summarizes email threads into bullet points
customSkills.instructionsPlaceholder:
Write detailed instructions for the agent...

You can use markdown formatting.
customSkills.secretsHint: These environment variables are required by the skill's scripts. Values are stored securely and never shown to the AI.

cancelConfirm.title: Stop execution?
cancelConfirm.message: The current task will be interrupted.

loading.longThinkingHint: I'm thinking a bit longer, but that's normal. You can have multiple chats running at once.

oauth.title: Authorization Required
oauth.defaultReason: This action requires you to authorize access.
oauth.popupNote: A popup will open for you to authorize access. After completing authorization, the assistant will continue automatically.

install.title: Install ZENO
install.androidDescription: Add the app to your home screen for quick access

suggestions.buttonExpanded: I'll save you time every day

business.label: Build online business
business.prompt:
I want to build an online business. Walk me through the entire process step by step:
1. Ask about my skills, experience, and how much time I can dedicate
2. Based on that, suggest 3 specific business ideas
3. Help me choose one - ask questions that will help me decide
4. Validate the idea - find competitors, assess the potential
5. Finally, create a landing page for this business

Start with the first step.

social.label: What people say about my company?
social.prompt: I want to know what people are saying about my company online. Ask me for the company name and products, then search Twitter, Reddit, forums, and other sources. Create a summary: what people praise, what they complain about, what questions they have.

landing.label: Analyze my landing page
landing.prompt: I need headline variants for A/B testing on my landing page. Ask me for the page URL, analyze it, and then suggest 10 different headline variants - from safe to bold.

plan.label: Plan my day
plan.prompt:
Plan my day for today. Check my emails and calendar, see what I have to do, and tell me:
- What's most urgent today
- What can I postpone
- Suggest the order of actions

marketing.label: Marketing strategy
marketing.prompt:
Help me plan a marketing strategy for my company. Start by asking:
- What I do and what I sell
- Who is my customer
- What's my budget and time
- What I've already tried

Based on that, propose a concrete action plan for the next month with priorities.

presentation.label: Create presentation
presentation.prompt:
Help me create a presentation. First ask me:
- What's the purpose of the presentation and who is the audience
- What I want to convey (main points)
- How many slides I need
- What style (formal, creative, minimalist)

Then create the presentation according to my guidelines.
